effect: Multi-strike moves (e.g., Icicle Spear, Bullet Seed) always hit the maximum number of times.
synergies: Multi-strike moves (e.g., Tail Slap, Rock Blast)
Held items like King's Rock or Razor Claw for flinch chance per hit
Pokémon with high Attack stat (e.g., Cloyster, Cinccino)
notes: Maximizes damage output and consistency of moves with variable hits; particularly powerful with Cloyster's Shell Smash sets.
